name: Neopets - Dark/Black
description:
Makes Neopets.com a much more viewable dark theme. 

Best used in conjuction with the official Neopets Purple theme (unlocked by visiting a user lookup with a purple pet and a purple petpet. Example: http://www.neopets.com/petlookup.phtml?pet=Trixie_3O3)

I also use Neopets - Remove Ads and More.
